CHAT_HELP:
This is a bot for pollings.

In group/channel you can:

1️⃣  Publish poll in current group
/publish 123456

2️⃣  Get the polling results with the specified id
/get 123456
HELP:
This is a bot for pollings.

You can:

1️⃣  Create a new poll
/new
Poll name (Displayed only for the author).
/text
Poll text.
/items
item_1
item_2
...
item_N

2️⃣  Edit an existing poll by ID
/edit 123456
/text
New text.
/items (Optional)
new_item_1
new_item_2
...
new_item_N

3️⃣  Publish poll in current chat
/publish 123456

4️⃣  Lock/unlock a poll by id
/lock 123456
/unlock 123456

5️⃣  Delete a poll by id
/delete 123456

6️⃣  Restore poll
/restore 123456

7️⃣  Get the polling results with the specified id
/get 123456

8️⃣  Get a list of polls
/list

Instead of ID, you can use the word 'last'
MAX10: A maximum 10 active polls are available.
MAX100:
A maximum 100 deleted polls are available.
Please wait - they will be cleaned in about a day.
ITEMCNTNOTMATCH: The number of items does not match.
EMPTYPOLL: The poll does not contain text or media.
NEWERROR: /new, /text and /items must be in a SINGLE MESSAGE.
SHARE0: Now you can click on http://t.me/enema_bot?startgroup=ID
SHARE1:
and select group for publish poll
Or manually type
/publish
